channel.title: Hot as Hell in the Kitchen
channel.description: Hot as Hell in the Kitchen

item.title: "A certain reverence is directed to the product be it a eel or a chicken I think Shinto has played a large part in this attitude everything has its own soul from a grain of rice to a tin can".
item.description:
"A certain reverence is directed to the product be it a eel or a chicken I think Shinto has played a large part in this attitude everything has its own soul from a grain of rice to a tin can". 

Food and Food Culture

item.title: how it was and how it is
item.description:
how it was and how it is

When I started cooking in the 70s the ultimate menus were made up of continental cuisine.
